title: Handle an Overdue Invoice
description: A customer's invoice is past its due date. A collections agent needs to contact the customer to secure payment.

tasks.description: Identify all invoices that are more than 30 days overdue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of delinquent accounts.

tasks.description: Contact a customer from the list to inquire about the overdue payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calls the customer and discusses the overdue invoice.

tasks.description: Process the payment over the phone or agree to a payment plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer agrees to pay immediately, and the agent processes the credit card payment.
